languages.text: "У "Обода Эриоха" остались неплохие торговые связи — продолжим вести дела с пиратами. Отныне эта станция — моя".
"Heriokh's Rim remains a valuable trade hub. We will continue to do business with pirates. From now on, this station is mine."
languages.original_text: "У "Обода Эриоха" остались неплохие торговые связи — продолжим вести дела с пиратами. Отныне эта станция — моя".

traits.locale_text: "Heriokh's Rim remains a valuable trade hub. We will continue to do business with pirates. From now on, this station is mine."
"Heriokh's Rim remains a valuable trade hub. We will continue to do business with pirates. From now on, this station is mine."
"Heriokh's Rim remains a valuable trade hub. We will continue to do business with pirates. From now on, this station is mine."

"Heriokh's Rim remains a valuable trade hub. We will continue to do business with pirates. From now on, this station is mine."

languages.text: "Heriokh's Rim bleibt ein wichtiges Handelszentrum. Wir werden weiterhin mit Piraten Geschäfte machen. Ab sofort gehört diese Station mir."
languages.original_text: "Heriokh's Rim remains a valuable trade hub. We will continue to do business with pirates. From now on, this station is mine."

traits.locale_text: "Heriokh's Rim bleibt ein wichtiges Handelszentrum. Wir werden weiterhin mit Piraten Geschäfte machen. Ab sofort gehört diese Station mir."

languages.text: « La Faille d'Heriokh reste une précieuse plateforme d'échanges. Nous allons continuer à commercer avec les pirates. Désormais, cette station m'appartient. »
languages.original_text: "Heriokh's Rim remains a valuable trade hub. We will continue to do business with pirates. From now on, this station is mine."

traits.locale_text: « La Faille d'Heriokh reste une précieuse plateforme d'échanges. Nous allons continuer à commercer avec les pirates. Désormais, cette station m'appartient. »

languages.text: «Borde de Heriokh aún es valioso como nexo comercial. Seguiremos negociando con los piratas. A partir de ahora, esta estación me pertenece».
languages.original_text: "Heriokh's Rim remains a valuable trade hub. We will continue to do business with pirates. From now on, this station is mine."

traits.locale_text: «Borde de Heriokh aún es valioso como nexo comercial. Seguiremos negociando con los piratas. A partir de ahora, esta estación me pertenece».

languages.text: 「ヘリオクのリムは貴重な貿易拠点としてあり続ける。海賊との取引は続ける。これより先、このステーションは私のものとする」
languages.original_text: "Heriokh's Rim remains a valuable trade hub. We will continue to do business with pirates. From now on, this station is mine."

traits.locale_text: 「ヘリオクのリムは貴重な貿易拠点としてあり続ける。海賊との取引は続ける。これより先、このステーションは私のものとする」

languages.text: “赫里奥卡之环可以继续担任贸易中心，我们也可以继续和那些海盗做生意。不过从现在开始，这个地方归我所有。”
languages.original_text: "Heriokh's Rim remains a valuable trade hub. We will continue to do business with pirates. From now on, this station is mine."

traits.locale_text: “赫里奥卡之环可以继续担任贸易中心，我们也可以继续和那些海盗做生意。不过从现在开始，这个地方归我所有。”

languages.text: "Heriokh'un Ağzı, kıymetli bir takas merkezi olarak kalacak. Korsanlarla iş yapmaya devam edeceğiz. Bundan böyle istasyon bana ait."
languages.original_text: "Heriokh's Rim remains a valuable trade hub. We will continue to do business with pirates. From now on, this station is mine."
